Suggestions for Improvement
- For Cleaniness - Improve sanitation standards in the areas related to the service or amenity.
- For Amenities - Increase the range of services and amenities offered or the use of modern amenities.
- For Location - Enhance customer experience and improve access to service or amenity.
- For Services - Develop stronger customer loyalty programs and develop customer service skills.
- For General - Increase customer satisfaction and improve the overall perception of the service or amenity.
- For Value - Increase value for money by lowering prices or providing more value added services.
